form-modal.title: Request Service
form-modal.subTitle: Send us an email detailing your desired service and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

success.title: Your message has been sent
success.subtitle: Thank you for reaching out. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Follow our social channels to stay updated!

error.title: Error Sending
error.subtitle: Sorry, we were unable to send your message. Please try again later.

header.subText: Don't let outdated security hold you back. Step into the future with a solution that is as intuitive as it is powerful, giving you peace of mind so you can focus on what truly matters.

firstContentText.title: Who said digital protection can't be innovative?
firstContentText.subTitle: With ByteGuard, managing your company's cybersecurity is easy, empowering, and never boring. Our intuitive platform brings clarity to your security protocols, simplifies threat management, and puts the power of advanced cybersecurity in your hands. Forget outdated security tools and embrace innovative solutions.

joinSection.title: See how cybersecurity automation can transform your business.
joinSection.subTitle: The cybersecurity solution you'll love and that will meet all your needs.

everySection.title: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
everySection.subTitle: We offer high-quality services, essential to meet the real needs of your application.

card1.title: Vulnerability analysis
card1.subTitle: Efficiently identify and fix security flaws, ensuring the protection of your data and systems for quick and secure decision-making.

card2.title: Penetration testing
card2.subTitle: Evaluate the security of your systems by simulating real attacks. Identify vulnerabilities and strengthen your defenses to ensure data integrity and protection.

card3.title: System monitoring
card3.subTitle: We monitor the performance of your applications and the integrity of your infrastructure in real time.

card4.title: Efficient solutions and specialized professionals
card4.subTitle: Elite protection and specialized support to ensure security.

card5.title: Phishing Prevention
card5.subTitle: Stay protected. Recognize suspicious signs and keep your data safe. One click can make all the difference.

meetSection.title: Come meet us
meetSection.subTitle: We are available through various communication channels, ready to <span>meet your needs.<span/>

card1.title: Socialize with us
card1.subTitle: Follow us on social media and learn more about who we are. Come be part of our story!

card2.title: Chat with us via WhatsApp
card2.subTitle: Just ask. With us by your side, navigating the cybersecurity maze becomes easy.

footer.byteRightText1: The ByteGuard Security brand is the exclusive property of Hypecode Software House. Any other trademarks mentioned are the property of their respective owners. Unless otherwise indicated, the use of third-party logos does not imply any endorsement, sponsorship, or affiliation with ByteGuard Security.
footer.byteRightText2: ByteGuard Security is a technology company focused on digital security, not a personal security company. Protection and monitoring services are provided in partnership with Hypecode Software House, an industry expert.
